IRS990EZ.PrimaryExemptPurposeTxt: TO FOSTER A CHRIST-LIKE VIEW OF HUMAN LIFE AND SEXUALITY BY OFFERING HOPE AND COMPASSIONATE HELP TO WOMEN EXPERIENCING AN UNPLANNED PREGNANCY.

ProgramSrvcAccomplishmentGrp.DescriptionProgramSrvcAccomTxt: THE MISSION OF MARY'S CHOICES IS TO OFFER HOPE AND COMPASSIONATE HELP TO WOMEN WITH UNPLANNED PREGNANCIES. OUR GOAL IS SAVING THE LIVES OF UNBORN CHILDREN AS WELL AS PROVIDING EMOTIONAL, SPIRITUAL, AND MATERIAL SUPPORT TO THOSE WOMEN EXPERIENCING UNPLANNED PREGNANCIES.AT MARY'S CHOICES WE OFFER FREE PREGNANCY TESTING AND FREE CONSULTATIONS WITH NURSES AND PHYSICIANS, EDUCATING THE WOMEN REGARDING THE OPTIONS AVAILABLE TO THEM. WE OFFER REFERRALS TO PRENATAL CARE AND OTHER COMMUNITY SERVICES THAT MAY BE OF HELP TO THE WOMEN. MARY'S CHOICES ALSO OFFERS FREE ULTRASOUNDS TO WOMEN WITH THE GOAL OF SAVING THE BABY'S LIFE. WHEN A MOTHER SEES HER BABY ON ULTRASOUND, SHE WILL DECIDE AGAINST ABORTION 95% OF THE TIME. MARY'S CHOICES PROVIDES SUPPORT TO WOMEN THROUGH MARY'S BABY STORE AND EDUCATIONAL PROGRAMS. MARY'S CHOICES OFFERS EDUCATIONAL VIDEOS ON PREGNANCY, LABOR, INFANT CARE, BABY DEVELOPMENT, DISCIPLINE, CHILD ILLNESS, INFANT AND CHILD CPR, ABORTION RECOVERY, BIBLE STUDY, AND CHASTITY TOPICS. MOTHERS EARN "POINTS" BY WATCHING THE VIDEOS. THE MOTHERS THEN USE THE "POINTS" TO SHOP IN MARY'S BABIES STORE AND GET WHAT THEY NEED TO HELP CARE FOR THEIR CHILD. MARY'S BABIES STORE PROVIDES MATERIAL SUPPORT TO THE WOMEN WHO ARE PREGNANT OR HAVE CHILDREN UNDER AGE 2. WOMEN MAY SHOP IN MARY'S BABY STORE MONTHLY, RECEIVING SUPPLIES VALUED UP TO $100. IN SEPTEMBER OF 2012, MARY'S CHOICES BEGAN SERVING WOMEN WITH UNEXPECTED PREGNANCIES. DURING 2014, MARY'S CHOICES SERVED 180 NEW CLIENTS, PERFORMED 71 SONOGRAMS, CONDUCTED 423 FOLLOW UP APPOINTMENTS, HAD 836 CLIENT PHONE CALLS, AND HAD 172 TRIPS TO OUR MARY'S BABIES STORE FOR BABY SUPPLIES, TOTALING A VALUE OF $9,249.
